channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Here's who's performed (so far) at the DNC tonight
item.description: The NPR Network will be reporting live from Chicago throughout the week bringing you the latest on the Democratic National Convention.
item.content:encoded:
The NPR Network will be reporting live from Chicago throughout the week bringing you the latest on the Democratic National Convention.

(Image credit: Joe Raedle)
item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: Appalachian influencer John Russell centers rural development in his pitch for Harris
item.description: Russell has gained popularity on TikTok. On the main stage, he blasted Trump for being a billionaire who wants to promote increased fossil fuel production and business.
item.content:encoded:
Russell has gained popularity on TikTok. On the main stage, he blasted Trump for being a billionaire who wants to promote increased fossil fuel production and business.

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: Ximena Bustillo

item.title: Al Sharpton delivers fiery remarks on race and Trump and brings out Central Park 5
item.description: “He spent a small fortune on full-page ads calling for the execution of five innocent young teenagers,” Sharpton said in reference to the five Black and Brown New York teenagers who were wrongly convicted of rape.
item.content:encoded: “He spent a small fortune on full-page ads calling for the execution of five innocent young teenagers,” Sharpton said in reference to the five Black and Brown New York teenagers who were wrongly convicted of rape.
item.dc:creator: Jaclyn Diaz

item.title: A visibly emotional Elizabeth Warren says Harris will protect Americans
item.description: Before Warren even began her remarks, the crowd met her with a warm reception and long applause. Both Warren and Harris vied for the Democratic presidential nomination in 2020.
item.content:encoded:
Before Warren even began her remarks, the crowd met her with a warm reception and long applause. Both Warren and Harris vied for the Democratic presidential nomination in 2020.

(Image credit: Saul Loeb)
item.dc:creator: Ashley Lopez

item.title: Who is Maya Harris, Kamala Harris' sister?
item.description: Like her sister Kamala Harris, Maya Harris is lawyer, and served as a senior policy adviser for Hillary Clinton's 2016 presidential campaign's policy agenda.
item.content:encoded:
Like her sister Kamala Harris, Maya Harris is lawyer, and served as a senior policy adviser for Hillary Clinton's 2016 presidential campaign's policy agenda.

(Image credit: Emma McIntyre)
item.dc:creator: C Mandler

item.title: Lionsgate apologizes to Coppola for now-pulled 'Megalopolis’ trailer
item.description: “We offer our sincere apologies to the critics involved and to Francis Ford Coppola and American Zoetrope for this inexcusable error,” a Lionsgate spokesperson said in a statement.
item.content:encoded:
“We offer our sincere apologies to the critics involved and to Francis Ford Coppola and American Zoetrope for this inexcusable error,” a Lionsgate spokesperson said in a statement.

(Image credit: ANGELA WEISS/AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Mandalit del Barco

item.title: United Auto Workers calls for a Palestinian speaker at DNC as thousands protest nearby
item.description: Criticism for Democrats not including a Palestinian speaker is coming from across the party — including organized labor. Meanwhile, thousands of protesters are gathering nearby for one last push.
item.content:encoded:
Criticism for Democrats not including a Palestinian speaker is coming from across the party — including organized labor. Meanwhile, thousands of protesters are gathering nearby for one last push.

(Image credit: Jim Vondruska)
item.dc:creator: Jaclyn Diaz

item.title: Atlanta hospital is accused of losing part of patient's skull following brain surgery
item.description: Fernando Cluster underwent emergency surgery in September 2022 at Emory University Hospital Midtown to relieve bleeding in his brain, which required part of his skull to be removed.
item.content:encoded:
Fernando Cluster underwent emergency surgery in September 2022 at Emory University Hospital Midtown to relieve bleeding in his brain, which required part of his skull to be removed.

(Image credit: Google Maps/Screenshot by NPR)
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Franklin

item.title: Why Democratic women are wearing white at the DNC
item.description: Women are wearing white to honor of the suffragists who fought to earn women the right to vote more than 100 years ago. Word spread through online chats as convention-goers packed their bags.
item.content:encoded:
Women are wearing white to honor of the suffragists who fought to earn women the right to vote more than 100 years ago. Word spread through online chats as convention-goers packed their bags.

(Image credit: Tamara Keith)
item.dc:creator: Tamara Keith

item.title: What to know about Massachusetts Gov. Maura Healey ahead of her DNC speech
item.description: Massachusetts Gov. Maura Healey, one of the first Democratic governors to suggest that President Joe Biden should end his reelection bid, will address the DNC Thursday night in Chicago.
item.content:encoded:
Massachusetts Gov. Maura Healey, one of the first Democratic governors to suggest that President Joe Biden should end his reelection bid, will address the DNC Thursday night in Chicago.

(Image credit: JOSEPH PREZIOSO)
item.dc:creator: Anthony Brooks
